metadata.name: Tavis Smiley
metadata.summary: Featuring interviews with artists, activists, news makers, politicians and everyday people.
metadata.description: Tavis Smiley features a unique mix of news and pop culture to create a thought-provoking and entertaining program. A hybrid of news, issues and entertainment, it features interviews with artists, activists, news makers, politicians and everyday people.
metadata.keywords: PBS, Tavis Smiley, news, interviews, politics, entertainment
